testcase.classname: Information Icons present for all fields in the KiwiSaver Retirement Calculator
testcase.name: validate that clicking Information icon for the Current Age field displayes expected message
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Kiwisaver Retirement Calculator........................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides Current Age field..............passed Then expected help message is displayed.....................................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides Employment status..............passed Then expeceted employment status help text is displayed.....................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides Current KiwiSavebalance field..passed Then expecetd kiwisaver balance help text is dispalyed......................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides voluntary contributions........passed Then expected volunatry contribution help text is displayed.................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides RiskProfile field..............passed Then expected riskProfile help information is displayed.....................passed When user clicks on Information icon besides savings goal at retirement field.passed Then expected savings goal at retirement help text is displayed.............passed

testcase.name: Employed users Projected Balance at age 30
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Kiwisaver Retirement Calculator page...................passed And current age of the user is 30 years.....................................passed And Employment status of the user is Employed...............................passed And user types salary of 82000..............................................passed And selects 4 percentage Kiwisaver memeber contribution.....................passed And chooses a Defensive risk profile........................................passed When user clicks on view your Kiwisaver Retirement Projections..............passed Then user can see estimated Kiwisaver balance details.......................passed

testcase.name: kiwiSaver Balance for Non employed users
testcase.system-out: Given user has navigated to WP KiwiSaver calculator page....................passed And current age of user is 55 years.........................................passed And Employment status of user is Non-employed...............................passed And Non-employed current KiwiSaver balance is $140000.......................passed And Non-employedvoluntary contributes $10 Annually..........................passed And Non-employed chooses a balanced risk profile............................passed And Non-employed saving goals requirement of $200000........................passed When Non-employed user clicks on view Kiwisaver Retirement Projections......passed Then Non-employed user can see projected Kiwisaver balance details..........passed

testcase.name: kiwiSaver Balance for Self employed users
testcase.system-out: Given user has navigated to KiwiSaver calculator page.......................passed And current age of the user is 45 years.....................................passed And Employment status of the user is Self-employed..........................passed And current KiwiSaver balance is $100000....................................passed And voluntary contributes $90 fortnightly...................................passed And chooses a Conservative risk profile.....................................passed And saving goals requirement of $290000.....................................passed When user clicks on view Kiwisaver Retirement Projections...................passed Then user can see projected Kiwisaver balance details.......................passed
